source.sqlReaderQuery:
select r.ID,  r.RequestorType,r.OrganisationName
from [Request].[Request] r 
where RequestorType is not null or OrganisationName is not null
select r.RequestId,r.StartDate, r.ShiftLength, r.LocationId, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[Shift] r
select r.RequestId, r.ActivityID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[SupportActivities] r

select r.RequestId, r.JobId, r.DateCreated, r.FieldChanged,r.CreatedByUserID,r.OldValue,r.NewValue,r.QuestionId,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Request].[UpdateHistory] r
select u.UserID,u.PostalCode, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[ChampionPostcode] u
select u.UserID,u.RegistrationStep,u.DateCompleted, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[RegistrationHistory] u
select u.UserID,u.ActivityID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[SupportActivity] u

select u.ID, u.FirebaseUID, u.PostalCode, u.EmailSharingConsent, u.MobileSharingConsent, u.OtherPhoneSharingConsent, u.HMSContactConsent, u.IsVolunteer, u.IsVerified, u.DateCreated, u.StreetChampionRoleUnderstood, u.SupportVolunteersByPhone, u.SupportRadiusMiles, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [User].[User] u

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.ID, a.[PostcodeId], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[LastUpdated] , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[AddressDetail] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[AddressDetail], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Name], a.[ShortName], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[PostCode],a.Latitude, a.Longitude, a.Instructions , CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[Location] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[Location], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Postcode],a.[LastUpdated],a.[Latitude],a.[Longitude],a.[FriendlyName],a.[IsActive], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[Postcode] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[PostCode], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, a.[Postcode],a.CompressedNearestPostcodes, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[PreComputedNearestPostcodes] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Address].[PreComputedNearestPostcodes], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

source.query: SELECT top 1 c.MaxTS FROM c order by c._ts desc

query.value: SELECT top 1 c._ts FROM c where c._ts>@{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.MaxTS} order by c._ts desc

SELECT IS_DEFINED(c.RecipientUserID) ? c.RecipientUserID : c.RecipientUserId AS RecipientUserID, c.MessageId, c.GroupId, c.JobId, c.TemplateName,c.event,udf.convertTime(c._ts) as EventTime, IS_DEFINED(c.RequestId) ? c.RequestId : -1 as RequestId FROM c where c.TemplateName<>null and 
c.event<>null

sqlReaderQuery.value: select CT.ID, a.[FeedbackDate], a.[JobId],a.[UserId], a.[RequestRoleTypeID],a.[FeedbackRatingTypeID], CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Feedback].[Feedback] a RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Feedback].[Feedback], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on a.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.ActivityID, CT.CredentialSetID, r.DisplayOrder, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID  and r.ActivityID = CT.ActivityID and r.CredentialSetID = CT.CredentialSetID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.Name, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Credential] 
r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[Credential], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.ID = CT.ID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, CT.GroupID, CT.CredentialID, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[CredentialSet] r 
RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[CredentialSet], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID  and r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.CredentialID = CT.CredentialID
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.ID, r.GroupName, r.ParentGroupId, r.GroupKey, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION, r.[ShiftsEnabled], r.[HomepageEnabled], r.[TasksEnabled], r.[GeographicName], r.[GroupType], r.[FriendlyName], r.[LinkURL], r.[ShortName], r.[JoinGroupPopUpDetail] from [Group].[Group] r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[Group], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on r.ID = CT.ID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

select CT.GroupID, CT.CredentialID, r.CredentialTypeID,r.Name, r.HowToAchieve, r.DisplayOrder, r.CredentialVerifiedByID, r.HowToAchieve_CTA_Destination, r.WhatIsThis,  CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupCredential] 
r RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [Group].[GroupCredential], @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT 
on r.GroupID = CT.GroupID and r.CredentialID = CT.CredentialID 
where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}
